name: rankel
body: |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cfv(crnk, c0), cfv(crnk, c1)))

stmt.origin: ax-mp(wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cfv(crnk, c0), cfv(crnk, c1))), wcel(c1, cuni(cima(cr1, con0))))
stmt.pretty: ax-mp((c0 ∈ c1 →(rank ` c0)∈(rank ` c1)), c1 ∈ ⋃(R1 " On))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cfv(crnk, c0), cfv(crnk, c1)))

-| wi(wcel(c1, cuni(cima(cr1, con0))), wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cfv(crnk, c0), cfv(crnk, c1))))

|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cfv(crnk, c0), cfv(crnk, c1)))

-| wi(wcel(c1, cuni(cima(cr1, con0))), wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cfv(crnk, c0), cfv(crnk, c1))))

body.origin:
|- wcel(c1, cuni(cima(cr1, con0)))
-| wcel(c1, universe)
-| wceq(cuni(cima(cr1, con0)), universe)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cfv(crnk, c0), cfv(crnk, c1)))

|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cfv(crnk, c0), cfv(crnk, c1)))
-| wi(wcel(c1, cuni(cima(cr1, con0))), wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cfv(crnk, c0), cfv(crnk, c1))))
-| wcel(c1, universe)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 →(rank ` c0)∈(rank ` c1))
⊣ (c1 ∈ ⋃(R1 " On)→(c0 ∈ c1 →(rank ` c0)∈(rank ` c1)))
⊣ c1 ∈ 𝕌

body.origin: |- wi(wcel(c1, cuni(cima(cr1, con0))), wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cfv(crnk, c0), cfv(crnk, c1))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cfv(crnk, c0), cfv(crnk, c1)))
-| wcel(c1, universe)

comment: The membership relation is inherited by the rank function. Proposition 9.16 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 79. (Contributed by NM, 4-Oct-2003.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 17-Nov-2014.)
